help-file.title: "MAGIC MISSILE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <victim> <direction> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
Casting this spell will cause a burst of magical bolts to spray forth from the caster's fingertips, impacting on the target with deadly accuracy. Between one and five missiles will be fired, depending on the proficiency of the caster.
